petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Landlord failed to maintain adequate heating facilities and fix malfunctioning gas heater
Failure to maintain premises in habitable condition due to gas leak and heating issues

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Yes, multiple notices from April 2021 through April 2023
rationale.evidenceAssessment: PG&E verification of gas leak, tenant documentation of communications and purchase of electric heater
rationale.impactAssessment: Significant impact on habitability requiring tenant to purchase alternative heating source
